std.value: How can I improve my English learning? What is the main problem in my English learning?
std.ai: How can I improve my English learning? What is the main problem in my English learning?

std.value: Can you give me some advice on my English learning? How can I increase my vocabulary?
std.ai: Can you give me some advice on my English learning? How can I increase my vocabulary?

std.value: What can I do to improve my pronunciation? Do you have any suggestions on improving my English?
std.ai: What can I do to improve my pronunciation? Do you have any suggestions on improving my English?

std.value: What can I do to remember all the grammars? Are there any ways to improve my writing?
std.ai: What can I do to remember all the grammars? Are there any ways to improve my writing?

question.ask: Questions 1~2  You are in your English teacher’s office. Ask the teacher two questions about English learning.
question.keywords: How improve English learning what main problem| Can give advice English how increase vocabulary|What do improve pronunciation do suggestions improving|What do remember grammars ways improve writing

std.value: May I know where you are from? What kind of sports do you like best?
std.ai: May I know where you are from? What kind of sports do you like best?

std.value: Which subject are you good at? What is your favourite subject?
std.ai: Which subject are you good at? What is your favourite subject?

std.value: Do you want to be my partner in our English class? Who’s your favourite singer?
std.ai: Do you want to be my partner in our English class? Who’s your favourite singer?

std.value: Where do you live? How do you usually go to school?
std.ai: Where do you live? How do you usually go to school?

std.value: When is your birthday? Do you like to join the football club with me after school?
std.ai: When is your birthday? Do you like to join the football club with me after school?

question.ask: Questions 3~4  You have a new classmate Bob. You want to get to know him. Ask him two questions.
question.keywords: where from what sports like|which subject good at what favourite subject|do want be partner who’s favourite singer|where live how go school|when birthday do like join club
